short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and save contacts and leads to Google Contacts directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Contacts Directly to Google Contacts: Quickly and easily save new contacts to your Google Contacts without leaving your browser. Add names, emails, phone numbers, and custom labels to ensure your contact information is always up-to-date.

Customizable Themes: Personalize your Contact Manager experience with a variety of themes. Choose from Default, Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, or Violet themes to match your style. The settings are saved globally, ensuring your preferred theme is applied across all pages within the extension.

Dark Mode Support: Toggle dark mode for a more comfortable viewing experience, especially in low-light environments. Dark mode is seamlessly integrated with your chosen theme, providing a consistent and visually appealing interface.

Effortless Label Management: Organize your contacts with custom labels that can be easily added, edited, and managed directly within the extension. Labels help you categorize and find contacts quickly, making your contact management more efficient.

Group Management: Create and manage contact groups to better organize your network. Assign contacts to groups such as Friends, Family, Work, or create your own custom groups to suit your needs.

User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through the extension with ease using a clean and intuitive interface. The settings and options are straightforward, ensuring that you can manage your contacts without any hassle.

Global Settings Persistence: All your preferences, including theme and dark mode settings, are saved globally. This means your customizations will be applied consistently across all pages within the extension, providing a unified experience.

Quick Access Settings: Access your settings instantly from any page within the extension. Adjust your themes, toggle dark mode, or manage labels and groups with just a few clicks.
